channel.title: [PI] Make npc talk above head, and attack eachother, and custom shop points!
channel.description:
I know its in npc handler for the talk above head! but what would the code be for it!
Attack eachother i just dont know a shit about!
and i made a custom point thing but the shop doesnt work for the points like i added the points and everything but when i try to buy it wont sell!
